column5: We are going to being fishing Big Vermillion out of Hudson, the first week in August. We have never fished there and are interested in best places and ways to catch Lakers and Smallies. Any help would be appreciated

I was there first of June. Had a great time. We got Trout by fishing in front of bays. Where you staying? Get ahold of Deer Path Lodge for more info. They are great people. I'm going back. E-Mail me if you wish.Set the hookJimbo
